title: Doom.3.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Game information:

3D-action from the company id Software - game that became a
legend even before the release of the game at all times.
Science has a lot - even open the gates to the unknown.
The question remains: what awaits us on the other side?
And only one person knows the answer. Only he can stop the evil.
He is the boundary between Earth and Adom.Doom 3 - it is a work
of art in the horror genre. Fascinating story, the atmosphere,
from which the blood run cold, game schedule, at one time raised
the bar to a whole new level - it all Doom 3. The game, which will
not leave anyone indifferent. One of the worst weather and computer
games, which became law in the golden fund of interactive entertainment.


How to enable widescreen support :

First, you need to find base folder within the game's main folder.

The full path would look like this:
.....  Doom 3  base

In the base folder you need to find DoomConfig.cfg. Open the file with your basic text editor, like Notepad.

In this file you need to find and change the following lines:
seta r_customHeight "xxx" (replace "xxx" with the desired resolution height, for example "1080")

seta r_customWidth "xxx" (replace "xxx" the desired resolution width, for example "1920")

seta r_mode "x" (replace "x" with "-1")

seta r_aspectRatio "x" (if you have a 16: 9 monitor, replace "x" with "1"; if you have 16:10 or 15: 9 monitor, replace "x" with "2")

Save the file, and enjoy the game!


Repack Features:

Doom 3
Do not cut / recoded
Game Version - 1.3.1
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
Additions:
Resurrection of Evil
